short_description: b&b butchers is a butcher shop based in fort worth, texas, united states.
long_description: with locations in houston and fort worth, b&b butchers & restaurant is an award-winning texas-based upscale steakhouse and traditional butcher shop specializing in high-quality meats and elevated customer service. we are dedicated to serving the finest texas and japanese wagyu beef as well as in-house dry-aged usda prime beef - all hand cut in the butcher shop. named one of opentable's "top 100 steakhouses in america," both locations of b&b are now two of only 38 u.s. restaurants certified by the kobe beef association in japan, offering 100% authentic, a5 certified kobe beef from tajima cattle. open daily for lunch, dinner, and weekend brunch with live music on sundays from 11am-3pm, the steakhouse provides an elegant dining experience with a full selection of local and global spirits, beer, wine and specialty cocktails.
